author: JuliaRegistrator

comments.body:
Your `new package` pull request does not meet the guidelines for auto-merging. Please make sure that you have read the [General registry README](https://github.com/JuliaRegistries/General/blob/master/README.md). The following guidelines were not met:

- Name does not meet all of the following: starts with an uppercase letter, ASCII alphanumerics only, not all letters are uppercase.
- Name is not at least five characters long
- The following dependencies do not have a `[compat]` entry that is upper-bounded and only includes a finite number of breaking releases: SpecialFunctions
- Package name similar to 20 existing packages.
<details>
<summary>Similar package names</summary>

1. Similar to GR. Damerau-Levenshtein distance 1 is at or below cutoff of 2. Damerau-Levenshtein distance 1 between lowercased names is at or below cutoff of 1. Normalized visual distance 0.72 is at or below cutoff of 2.50.
2. Similar to SVR. Damerau-Levenshtein distance 1 is at or below cutoff of 2. Damerau-Levenshtein distance 1 between lowercased names is at or below cutoff of 1.
3. Similar to Z3. Damerau-Levenshtein distance 2 is at or below cutoff of 2.
4. Similar to H3. Damerau-Levenshtein distance 2 is at or below cutoff of 2.
5. Similar to CRC. Damerau-Levenshtein distance 2 is at or below cutoff of 2.
6. Similar to SPH. Damerau-Levenshtein distance 2 is at or below cutoff of 2.
7. Similar to Tk. Damerau-Levenshtein distance 2 is at or below cutoff of 2.
8. Similar to GSL. Damerau-Levenshtein distance 2 is at or below cutoff of 2.
9. Similar to SMC. Damerau-Levenshtein distance 2 is at or below cutoff of 2.
10. Similar to SHA. Damerau-Levenshtein distance 2 is at or below cutoff of 2.
11. Similar to SCS. Damerau-Levenshtein distance 2 is at or below cutoff of 2.
12. Similar to CSV. Damerau-Levenshtein distance 2 is at or below cutoff of 2.
13. Similar to HSL. Damerau-Levenshtein distance 2 is at or below cutoff of 2.
14. Similar to LSL. Damerau-Levenshtein distance 2 is at or below cutoff of 2.
15. Similar to SMM. Damerau-Levenshtein distance 2 is at or below cutoff of 2.
16. Similar to SOM. Damerau-Levenshtein distance 2 is at or below cutoff of 2.
17. Similar to DSP. Damerau-Levenshtein distance 2 is at or below cutoff of 2.
18. Similar to VSL. Damerau-Levenshtein distance 2 is at or below cutoff of 2.
19. Similar to ASE. Damerau-Levenshtein distance 2 is at or below cutoff of 2.
20. Similar to LNR. Damerau-Levenshtein distance 2 is at or below cutoff of 2.
</details>

- I was not able to load the package (i.e. `import SR` failed). See the CI logs for details.

Note that the guidelines are only required for the pull request to be merged automatically. However, it is **strongly recommended** to follow them, since otherwise the pull request needs to be manually reviewed and merged by a human.

Since you are registering a new package, please make sure that you have also read the package naming guidelines: https://julialang.github.io/Pkg.jl/dev/creating-packages/#Package-naming-guidelines-1



---
If you want to prevent this pull request from being auto-merged, simply leave a comment. If you want to post a comment without blocking auto-merging, you must include the text `[noblock]` in your comment.
<!-- [noblock] -->
<!---
this_is_the_single_automerge_comment
--->

FYI: I have renamed the package to SymbolicRegression.jl to satisfy the naming requirements.

See #28107
